title: Fragment of Figure of Osiris
description:
Fragment of a small bronze Osiris. The lower portions of this solid figure from the mid-chest down are missing. The god wears the White Crown with two feathers flanking it above a long wig of incised lines. There are areas of incised cross-hatching on what remains of the figure's body.
Condition: Small areas of patination.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
